title: Which are the technology knowledge sites? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are lots of sites,to gain knowledge . 1. Digital Trends 2. Ars Technica 3. Engadget 4. Computer World 5. TechCrunch 6.A Life Hacker . 7. LifeHacker 8. ZDNet 9. Tech Republic. 10.The next web 11. Wired 12. Gizmodo

Which technology you are looking to gain knowledge? Ok, however there are lot of websites which teach the basics of almost all leading technologies under one roof. Follow newsletter of edX , they will give more info on top things. You can learn any technology basics at CodeAcademy or Tutorialspoint
